ygData.subject: Question concerning research...

ygData.messageBody:
Hi all, I am nearing lvl 16 and I was wondering if anyone could give me a
bit of info about research? i'm collecting wors for the important spells
but am unsure how I have to train research, what skill are needed to
research what spells etc. I also have a great lightstone, which i believe I
use to get some concordonance book from a gypsy in south ro to train
research - is this coorect? Also will they deal with me, as i am a gnome
not a dark elf? ANy general and more specific info would be appreciated -
Malados lvl 15 gnoem necro on solusek ro server
